variables.input:
fetch bizevents, from:now()-375d, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devops"
| fieldsKeep `project-name`
| dedup `project-name`

0.title: üîÑ Number of completed builds
0.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter `project-name` == $AzureDevOps_ProjectName
| summarize count=countDistinct(`pipeline-number`)

1.title: ‚úÖ Successful builds
1.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops" and event.type == "pipeline"
| filter matchesPhrase(`pipeline-status`,"succeeded")
| filterOut (isNull(`pipeline-status`))
| summarize buildcount=countDistinct(`pipeline-number`),by:{`pipeline-status`}

2.title: ‚ùå Failed builds
2.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops" and event.type == "pipeline"
| filter matchesPhrase(`pipeline-status`,"failed")
| filterOut (isNull(`pipeline-status`))
| summarize buildcount=countDistinct(`pipeline-number`),by:{`pipeline-status`}

3.title: üßô Last completed build by User

4.title: üìã Outcome of builds by user

5.title: üöÄ  Most recent completed build version
5.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devops"
| filter `project-name` == $AzureDevOps_ProjectName
| summarize buildNumber = toString(toLong(takeMax(`pipeline-number`)))

6.title: ‚è∞ Average total build time
6.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devops" and event.type=="pipeline"
| filter `project-name` == $AzureDevOps_ProjectName
| fields buildDuration = `pipeline-duration`
| summarize avg(buildDuration), alias:`Build duration`

11.title: ‚ùóÔ∏è Aborted builds
11.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops" and event.type == "pipeline"
| filter matchesPhrase(`pipeline-status`,"aborted")
| filterOut (isNull(`pipeline-status`))
| summarize buildcount=countDistinct(`pipeline-number`),by:{`pipeline-status`}

13.title: üìÑ Average total build time by result
13.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devops" and event.type=="pipeline"
| filter `project-name` == $AzureDevOps_ProjectName
| fields buildDuration = `pipeline-duration`, `pipeline-status`
| fields buildDuration = buildDuration, `Build result` = `pipeline-status`
| summarize avg(buildDuration), by:{`Build result`}, alias:`Build duration`

16.title: ‚úÖ Last 5 successful builds
16.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops" and event.type=="pipeline"
| filter `project-name` == $AzureDevOps_ProjectName
| filter `pipeline-status` == "succeeded"
| sort `pipeline-number`, direction:"descending"
| fields timestampFromUnixMillis(`pipeline-started_at`), alias:`Pipeline start time`,`pipeline-number`,`pipeline-status`,`pipeline-triggered_by`,`pipeline-duration`
| limit 5

17.title: ‚ùå Last 5 failed builds in 24-hour
17.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops" and event.type=="pipeline"
| filter `project-name` == $AzureDevOps_ProjectName
| filter `pipeline-status` == "failed"
| sort `pipeline-number`, direction:"descending"
| fields timestampFromUnixMillis(`pipeline-started_at`), alias:`Pipeline start time`,`pipeline-number`,`pipeline-status`,`pipeline-triggered_by`,`pipeline-duration`
| limit 5

19.title: üìà Last 24-hour build duration trend
19.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.type=="pipeline" and event.provider == "azure-devops"
| fieldsAdd buildTimestamp = timestampFromUnixMillis(`pipeline-started_at`)
| fieldsAdd buildDuration = `pipeline-duration`
| makeTimeseries avg(buildDuration), by:{`pipeline-number`}, alias:`Build duration`, time: buildTimestamp

21.title: ‚úÖ Successful tasks
21.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devOps" and event.type == "job"
| filter status == "succeeded"
| summarize completedTasks=count(), by:{stagename, status}
| fieldsRename stagename, Taskname

22.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Aborted stages
22.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devOps" and event.type == "job"
| filter status == "aborted"
| summarize completedTasks=count(), by:{stagename, status}
| fieldsRename stagename, Taskname

23.title: ‚ùå Failed stages
23.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devOps" and event.type == "job"
| filter status == "failed"
| summarize medianDuration=median(`stageDuration`), by:{stagename, status}
| fieldsRename stagename, Taskname

24.title: ‚è±Ô∏è Successful stage duration
24.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devOps" and event.type == "job"
| filter status == "succeeded"
| summarize medianDuration=median(`stageDuration`), by:{stagename, status}
| fieldsRename stagename, Taskname

25.title: ‚è±Ô∏è Aborted stage duration
25.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devOps" and event.type == "job"
| filter status == "aborted"
| summarize medianDuration=median(`stageDuration`), by:{stagename, status}
| fieldsRename stagename, Taskname

26.title: ‚è±Ô∏è Failed stage duration
26.query:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devOps" and event.type == "job"
| filter status == "failed"
| summarize medianDuration=median(`stageDuration`), by:{stagename, status}
| fieldsRename stagename, Taskname

33.title: Build trend over the 24-hours
33.query:
fetch bizevents,scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.provider=="azure-devops" and event.type == "pipeline" 
| filter `project-name` == $AzureDevOps_ProjectName and `pipeline-status` == "succeeded" 
| summarize buildTimestamp=collectDistinct(`pipeline-started_at`),by:{`pipeline-number`}
| fieldsAdd buildTimestamp = toTimestamp(buildTimestamp)
| makeTimeseries count(), by: {`pipeline-number`},time:buildTimestamp
